document.heading: Redevelopment of the Center Leg Freeway (Interstate 395) Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-257, the “Redevelopment of the Center Leg Freeway (Interstate 395) Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-806 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development, Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 29, 2010, and July 13, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 6, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-533 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-257 became effective on October 26, 2010.
